name: WaveStaff
tag_list: ecommerce, executive-search, online-advertising, recruiting, product-marketing, product-management, sales, saas, software, seo, jobs, digital-media, mobile, streaming
overview:
WaveStaff is a leading Executive Search firm.

Established in early 2002, they are a team of free thinking recruiters who are connected to sales, product, and marketing professionals within Online Media, Mobile Technology and Enterprise Software Solutions and Services.

WaveStaff finds and places high performance Sales, Marketing and Professional Services talent with some of the hottest companies in the industry. They work with technological start-ups to industry giants in order to provide the best service to not only clients, but candidates.

With an outstanding network of professionals and access to industry and thought leaders across North America, WaveStaff can help you win the war for talent.
